title: The election of 1800 has been referred to as co...

content.prompt: The election of 1800 has been referred to as constituting “another revolution” because

choices.label: the House of Representatives decided the election
a Supreme Court decision was required to dislodge the Federalists
the party in power stepped down after losing the election
force was required to get John Adams to leave the White House

topic.text: 4.2: The Rise of Political Parties and the Era of Jefferson

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
